title: Bug 124067: Support relative path when selecting XML file
description: When selecting an XML file, the system only supports absolute paths and should also support relative paths.
OB: When selecting an XML file, the system only supports using absolute paths. The actual result is that the relative path is not supported. The expected result is that both relative and absolute paths are supported.
EB: Currently, when selecting an XML file, only absolute paths are supported. The system should be updated to also support relative paths.
SR: To reproduce this issue, create a new data source and dataset based on an XML file.
